headline: Bristol Myers Stock Surges 36.5% in Six Months: Time to Buy or Sell?
summary: Bristol Myers stock has witnessed a stupendous rally in the past six months. We believe there is more room for growth, and any dip in the share price can be used as a buying opportunity.
